pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, November 16, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, November 16, 2016:

Havana, Republic of Cuba

9:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion with civil society representatives.

Corona A Room, Mezzanine Level
Meliá Cohiba Hotel
Havana, Republic of Cuba

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the University of Havana and will participate in a Q & A.

Aula Magna Hall, Ground Floor
University of Havana
Havana, Republic of Cuba

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Corona A Room, Mezzanine Level
Meliá Cohiba Hotel
Havana, Republic of Cuba

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 4:00 p.m.


9:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart Havana for Buenos Aires, Argentina.

José Martí International Airport
Havana, Republic of Cuba

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity


Note: all times local


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
